achievements.name: Challenge Accepted
achievements.description: Complete any activity.

achievements.name: Fill 'er Up!
achievements.description: Refuel at any ground fuel station.

achievements.name: Rubberneck
achievements.description: Use the Smart Cam to view a star landmark for 3 seconds, from a distance of 550 yards or less.

achievements.name: Mother Nature
achievements.description: Adjust the weather during a flight.

achievements.name: Start Me Up
achievements.description: Manually start the Airbus A320neo's engines, without using Assistance.

achievements.name: By the Book
achievements.description: Request landing clearance from ATC at a towered airport, without using ATC assistance.

achievements.name: In The Wild
achievements.description: Use the Smart Cam to view animals for 3 seconds, from a distance of 550 yards or less.

achievements.name: Service with a Smile
achievements.description: Request each type of pre-flight Ground Service while at an appropriate airport gate.

achievements.name: Back-Up Plan
achievements.description: Utilize pre-flight Pushback Service to move aircraft, for a total distance of 1 mile.

achievements.name: Job Shadowing
achievements.description: Create a flight plan based on a Live Traffic aircraft, then fly the route without assistance.

achievements.name: Wheels Up, Wheels Down
achievements.description: Complete a non-stop flight of at least 300 miles from take-off to landing.

achievements.name: Look Ma, No Hands!
achievements.description: Utilize autopilot for a total of 600 miles.

achievements.name: Light Chop
achievements.description: Land at an airport where windspeeds are in excess of 5 knots, without using any assistance.

achievements.name: On the Green
achievements.description: Land on a grass runway, without using any assistance.

achievements.name: Stay on Target
achievements.description: Use the Instrument Landing System (ILS) to complete a landing.

achievements.name: My Way
achievements.description: Complete a non-stop 300+ mile flight from parking to parking spot, without assistance.

achievements.name: Deadstick Landing
achievements.description: After receiving landing clearance, switch off engines and successfully land on the runway.

achievements.name: Working for the Weekend
achievements.description: Complete a weekly activity.

achievements.name: Frequent Flyer Miles
achievements.description: Fly from LFBD airport near Asobo Studio to KSEA airport near Microsoft HQ.

achievements.name: Road Trip
achievements.description: Taxi aircraft for a total distance of 100 miles.

achievements.name: A Few Bumps
achievements.description: Land at an airport where windspeeds are in excess of 15 knots, without using any assistance.

achievements.name: Short Stuff
achievements.description: Land on a runway shorter than 2,000 feet, without using any assistance or bypassing any travel.

achievements.name: Uphill Climb
achievements.description: Land on a runway that has at least a 12 degree incline, without using any assistance.

achievements.name: Fire and Ice
achievements.description: Complete the Patagonia Bush Trip, without using any navigation assistance.

achievements.name: Anemoi
achievements.description: Complete the Balkans Bush Trip, without using any navigation assistance.

achievements.name: Goldrush
achievements.description: Complete the Nevada Bush Trip, without using any navigation assistance.

achievements.name: Tour Guide
achievements.description: Use the Smart Cam to view 25 star landmarks, from a distance of 550 yards or less.

achievements.name: Pilot Program
achievements.description: Accumulate 50 hours of flight time in a single pilot profile.

achievements.name: Greased
achievements.description: Complete every Landing Challenge.

achievements.name: Hydroplaning
achievements.description: Accumulate 50 hours of flight time in rainy weather.

achievements.name: Flights of Fancy
achievements.description: Complete flights of at least 300 miles using a prop, jet and airliner.

achievements.name: Saddle Sore
achievements.description: Complete a flight of at least 8 hours with a propeller or turbo-prop aircraft.

achievements.name: Century Club
achievements.description: Accumulate 100 hours of flight time in a single pilot profile.

achievements.name: Night Owl
achievements.description: Accumulate 50 hours of flight time at night.

achievements.name: Instrumental
achievements.description: Accumulate 50 hours of IFR flight time, including at least one take-off and landing.

achievements.name: Decathlon
achievements.description: Complete 10 weekly activities.

achievements.name: Completionist
achievements.description: Complete every activity.

achievements.name: SIDs and STARs
achievements.description: Land at every star airport shown on the World Map.

achievements.name: Landmarks the Spot
achievements.description: Use the Smart Cam to view 100 star landmarks, from a distance of 550 yards or less.

achievements.name: World Traveler
achievements.description: Land successfully at 500 different airports.

achievements.name: Jack of All Planes
achievements.description: Complete a 300+ mile flight with every aircraft in the standard edition of Flight Simulator.

achievements.name: Journeyman
achievements.description: Accumulate 500 hours of flight time in a single pilot profile.

achievements.name: Wing Commander
achievements.description: Accumulate 1,000 hours of flight time in a single pilot profile.
